name: Nonograms 22
description:
Nonograms 22 is a polished picross game jam packed with beautiful pixel art and a slick UI. It contains over 216 puzzles for you to solve which is bound to keep you solving for hours!

Nonograms 22 features:
  • 216+ puzzles of beautiful pixel art.
  • A 'Hearts' system designed to add another layer of challenge to standard picross.
  • Beautiful UI.
  • Relaxing soundtrack.
  • Full controller support (coming soon!).
  • Customizable audio settings.
  • Over 20+ hours of nonogram fun!

Get Nonograms 22 today!
